item.title: Data Visualization Using a Bar Chart
item.description: Letâ€™s graph homeruns from the year 1980. First, we need to bring in our downloaded pacakges using the library feature. library(Lahman) library(dplyr) library(ggiraph) library(ggplot2) Next, we need to extract the data we want to display from Lahman. During this step, we will also arrange our data ahead of time so that when we finally put our bar chart together, the homeruns will display from most to least.
